abstract: Planet Green, the environmentally-oriented cable channel from Discovery Communications, is preparing to name a new general manager.
snippet: Planet Green, the environmentally-oriented cable channel from Discovery Communications, is preparing to name a new general manager.
lead_paragraph: | Update: 3:38 p.m.: Planet Green, the environmentally oriented cable channel from Discovery Communications, has named a new general manager. Laura Michalchyshyn, who had run the Sundance Channel, has been named to the job, according to TV Week.

headline.main: Discovery Names New Chief for Planet Green
